data.description: *Accepting back up offers* This must see 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom, fenced in yard ranch has been completely renovated to give you open concept. Along with all the updated must haves in the kitchen, it has a newer furnace, A/C, and tankless water heater.  Schedule your showing now to see for yourself!
